channel.title: Recipes on On the Backs of Turtles
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on On the Backs of Turtles

item.title: Chocolate Stout Cake Recipe
item.author: tuirgin.blog@gmail.com (Christopher D. Walborn)
item.description: This chocolate cake is dense and rich, but not overly sweet, especially if it is divided into 4 layers. It has been Anastasia’s birthday cake since she was little.

item.title: Dad's Burgers
item.author: tuirgin.blog@gmail.com (Christopher D. Walborn)
item.description: These burgers are family favorite. Simple, thick slices of everything, and finished off with a spicy dressing that balances it all out.
